title: Whats the order of the rotating gamemodes?

replies.body:
The rotation seems to be along the lines of Ascension > Legend of the Poro King > URF > Hexakill TT > OFA, with URF "moving up" in the rotation causing it to appear more frequently (last time it came between Ascension and LotPK rather than between LotPK and Hexakill).

It's important to note that the queue is still *technically* "starting up", so the current rotation isn't necessarily what we'll see later on.

http://www.surrenderat20.net
Scroll down on the right side you will see the next (Update each week)
Hexakill TT then All for one then Ascension
